reviews.text: Train service is fantastic. However the ‘bouncers’ are absolutely rude and disrespectful. As someone who uses this station regularly it is a huge disappointment that they have employed security who can’t do their job properly. Absolutely disgusting and I can’t believe that they shouted at 2 children for having scooters saying “get off your scooter, don’t ride it!” When it was clearly being carried 😘
Not exactly ample seating as I think the only things that have been updated since the 80s are the removal of timetables in useful places, and the ticket machines to get in and out.
Staff are friendly and efficient and it has changed a lot over the years.
Busy branch line station that all trains in Cardiff go through. Has a cafe and toilets.

Constant delays into Cardiff due to the Queen Street Bridge. 4 train lines sharing a 2 train line bridge (ludicrous). It will be even worse when more trains are added to the line over the coming years!
